name: Blee
headline: Smart, fast, and collaborative compliance reviews
description: Blee easily integrates across the content creation workflow, combining instant feedback and faster approvals with scalable review and recordkeeping. Helping companies maximize revenue by moving faster to market while minimizing risk

Smart, fast, and collaborative
# AI Compliance platform that Scales with your GTM
Unblock your GTM teams & say yes faster with an AI-driven, easy-to-use platform for reviewing customer content
[Request Demo](https://www.blee.com/<#contactForm>)
![Blee compliance score snapshot ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627a49be5a94099daf6301b_banner-main-img-1.webp)
![Blee compliance dashboard ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627a4b151fa21f1483a092f_banner-main-img-2.webp)
## Compliance And Risk Management For All Marketing Content 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662633c20b89bed036b375c6_red-bar.svg)
One easy-to-use, modern platform to review your team's marketing materials 
![Risk management team ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f74ec6f9d5646003f217c_risk-management-big-img.webp)
[Request Demo](https://www.blee.com/<#contactForm>)

Feature Highlights
## Full Lifecycle Marketing, Product, And Sales Compliance Review
Blee easily integrates across the content creation workflow, combining instant feedback and faster approvals with scalable review and recordkeeping
AI-Powered Proactive Insights
Save hours on initial review with integrated, real-time compliance insights for content creators
![Blee Analysis ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627a9ddcd53319ff4e4e82c_ai-powred-img-1.webp)![Blee toggles ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627a9ff7c713a4cf2994034_ai-powered-img-2.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/66263dcbf6b22b8cf215e944_testi-p-img.webp)
Intuitive Review Workflows
Approve internal and external materials faster with intuitive workflows that simplify the submission, comment, and review cycles
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/66265284e6775ae0d8695d6b_Intuitive-elipise.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662652843e919f3aa59677ea_Intuitive-star.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f8688606e04b6551dd590_user-img-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f8688fbe87a58ccd7450a_user-img-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f8688ef18679309e8d90c_user-img-6.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f8687324c724c36666989_user-img-3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f86883f1c9631c4bfbd29_user-img-5.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f868c6ab9bbabd7a7c1af_user-img-4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/662f87e39849844a13d0f2d0_blee-user-img.png)
Custom Risk Profile
Manage your risk tolerance based on industry standards, custom rules, and company preference
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627ac4bf1170494816c8629_custom-img.webp)
Automated Recordkeeping
Automatically generate flexible and deployable records and audit trails
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6627aca195b311d9376725e9_automated-img-1.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66260deee66b7f6a33e219ba/6626581627fbf5a5a049e96a_automated-img-1.svg)

Blog
## Stay on top of marketing compliance with us
The compliance landscape changes fast. Stay on top of it with our guides and articles
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66274df36aca3c89ee45ca1b/662a5474e34383c65dcc6be8_blog-thumb-img-3.webp)](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/ftc-director-encourages-tolling-agreements-for-companies-under-investigation>)
[FTC Director Encourages Tolling Agreements for Companies Under Investigation](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/ftc-director-encourages-tolling-agreements-for-companies-under-investigation>)
March 6, 2024
4 minutes
The FTC’s increased enforcement activity might be coming into conflict with restrictions on their ability to seek monetary relief. Prior to the Supreme Court’s decision in AMG Capital Management, LLC v. FTC, 141 S. Ct. 1341 (2021), 
[Read More](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/ftc-director-encourages-tolling-agreements-for-companies-under-investigation>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66274df36aca3c89ee45ca1b/662a54ff4a419fe48b77c5c6_blog-thumb-img-2.webp)](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/cfpb-takes-aim-at-comparison-shopping-sites-for-financial-products>)
[CFPB Takes Aim at Comparison-Shopping Sites for Financial Products](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/cfpb-takes-aim-at-comparison-shopping-sites-for-financial-products>)
March 6, 2024
4 minutes
On February 29, 2024, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) issued Circular 2024-01, Preferencing and steering practices by digital intermediaries for consumer financial products or services. Continuing to expand their definition of “covered persons” who are subject to their jurisdiction,
[Read More](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/cfpb-takes-aim-at-comparison-shopping-sites-for-financial-products>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66274df36aca3c89ee45ca1b/662a5521e2b06d86591b0f33_blog-thumb-img.webp)](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/financial-app-startup-floatme-faces-a-3-million-penalty-from-the-ftc-for-deceptive-practices>)
[Financial App Startup FloatMe Faces a $3 Million Penalty from the FTC for Deceptive Practices](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/financial-app-startup-floatme-faces-a-3-million-penalty-from-the-ftc-for-deceptive-practices>)
January 8, 2024
4 minutes
Continuing a trend from 2023, the Federal Trade Commission has kicked off the new year with a host of enforcement activity. Of particular interest is their recent action against FloatMe, a cash advance firm based in San Antonio, Texas.
[Read More](https://www.blee.com/</blogs/financial-app-startup-floatme-faces-a-3-million-penalty-from-the-ftc-for-deceptive-practices>)

generated_description:
**Blee: Simplifying Compliance Through AI**

Founded in 2022 and situated in the bustling heart of New York City, Blee is shaking up the compliance world. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S22, they stand out with a clear mission: to enable smart, fast, and collaborative compliance reviews. At a time when companies are looking to streamline their workflows and reduce risks, Blee has positioned itself as a critical tool in the content creation landscape.

Blee’s platform integrates seamlessly into existing content workflows, allowing for instant feedback and faster approvals—all while maintaining scalable review and recordkeeping. This not only accelerates the go-to-market (GTM) process but also helps companies maximize revenue while minimizing compliance risks. This balance gives teams more agility to innovate and respond swiftly to market demands.

Blee is powered by a lean but effective team of six, including their Group Partner, Aaron Epstein. With a mix of expertise in artificial intelligence, fintech, and legal technology, Blee leverages cutting-edge solutions to address compliance challenges across marketing, product, and sales content. 

Their platform boasts several key features:
- **AI-Powered Proactive Insights**: Blee saves time by automating compliance checks and providing real-time insights, thus reducing the burden on compliance teams.
- **Intuitive Review Workflows**: The platform simplifies how teams collaborate, streamlining feedback and approval processes.
- **Custom Risk Profiles**: Companies can tailor their compliance measures according to specific industry standards and internal requirements, enhancing adaptability.
- **Automated Recordkeeping**: Blee automates the generation of regulatory records and audit trails, ensuring that companies have the documentation they need at their fingertips.

Blee is also committed to user education with a blog that keeps clients informed on compliance trends and regulatory changes. They aim to be a partner in navigating the evolving landscape of compliance.

As Blee continues to grow, they are dedicated to enabling companies to tackle compliance with confidence and efficiency, fostering an environment where risk is managed effectively, and innovative ideas can thrive.

For more insights and to explore their offerings, you can visit their website at [Blee.com](https://www.blee.com).
